document.full_text: as family and friends gathered for the funeral of derek boogaard in regina, saskatchewan, on saturday, boogaard was remembered in the context of a different kind of family - his last "billet mom," in medicine hat, alberta.
document.title: boogaard is remembered by his 'billet mom'
lines_and_colors: as family and friends gathered for the funeral of derek boogaard in regina, saskatchewan, on saturday, boogaard was remembered in the context of a different kind of family - his last "billet mom," in medicine hat, alberta.
